title: How to Be Good at Agar.io

steps.title: Avoid others at first.
steps.content: Avoid others at first. When you first join the game, you are going to be small. As such, avoid people and try to eat just the cells that are not players.

steps.title: Hide.
steps.content: Hide. If someone big is chasing you, hide in the green spiky circles. These are called viruses. If you are bigger than the virus, you will split, so make sure to only do this when you are small. If the player that is chasing you is smaller than the virus, or the same size, then this will not work.

steps.title: Get about 300 points.
steps.content: Get about 300 points. This is where it's recommended that you begin chasing other players. Be careful, though, as you cannot eat cells that are larger than your own cell.

steps.title: Split.
steps.content: Split. Many players split themselves to try and eat other players. This can be done by pushing the space bar. Splitting can send your cell forward, allowing you to eat another cell as long as your split piece is bigger than their entire cell.

steps.title: Make sure that your split piece is larger than the other player.
steps.content: Make sure that your split piece is larger than the other player. That is how to catch them.

steps.title: Press W.
steps.content: Press W. This allows you to lose some mass and give it to another player, which makes that player bigger and you smaller.

steps.title: Be mutually supportive.
steps.content: Be mutually supportive. If you have a loyal team you can feed each other, and protect each other from threats. Teaming is a great way to survive longer. However, Anti-Teaming is added to agar.io, so play in Party mode if you want to team.

steps.title: Lure smaller players into boundaries and trap them so that you can eat them.
steps.content: Lure smaller players into boundaries and trap them so that you can eat them.

steps.title: Press W and when smaller players go after your ejected mass, you can "unexpectedly" kill them.
steps.content: Press W and when smaller players go after your ejected mass, you can "unexpectedly" kill them.

steps.title: If you find a Mother Cell in your game, you can let other people feed it.
steps.content: If you find a Mother Cell in your game, you can let other people feed it. Then just collect the food it produces without you having to eject mass.

steps.title: Aim to lure bigger players into viruses.
steps.content: Aim to lure bigger players into viruses. However, they probably won't fall for it. You can get about 120 mass and stay still directly over a virus thus hiding the virus, and wait for a bigger player to try to eat you. They will explode and you will get huge instantly.
